Class Pendulum

java.lang.Object
  Pendulum

public class Pendulum
extends java.lang.Object

A simple class to represent a swinging pendulum.

Author:
Justin Johnson

Constructor Detail

Pendulum

public Pendulum(double length,
                double gravity,
                double angle,
                double velocity)
Creates a new Pendulum.

Parameters:
length - The length of the pendulum arm.
gravity - The force of gravity.
angle - The initial angle.
velocity - The initial velocity.

getEnergy

public double getEnergy()
Gets the current energy of the pendulum.

Returns:
